about.title: About Us - Enosh Infra
about.description: Discover Enosh Infra, a premier real estate consultancy firm dedicated to providing tailored commercial property solutions in India.

intro.welcome: Welcome to Enosh Infra, a premier real estate consultancy specializing in commercial property rentals for multinational corporations and foreign enterprises seeking to establish a presence in India.
intro.location: Based in Bengaluru, India's thriving business hub, we are committed to delivering customized, high-quality real estate solutions.

whyChoose.heading: Why Choose Enosh Infra?
points: Specialists in commercial real estate for global corporations.
Exclusive access to prime office spaces in Bengaluru.
AI-powered property matching for optimal selection.
End-to-end consultancy from research to legal formalities.
Strong industry connections for seamless transactions.
Dedicated experts ensuring efficient and effective solutions.

about.motto: Our Motto: "Transforming Real Estate with AI-Driven Precision."

seo.title: Commercial & Retail Spaces - Enosh Infra
seo.description: Explore premium commercial and retail spaces with Enosh Infra, your trusted real estate consultancy in Bengaluru.

commercial.title: Commercial & Retail Spaces
commercial.para1: Enosh Infra specializes in helping businesses find the perfect commercial and retail spaces that align with their needs and brand image. Whether you are looking for a prime storefront, a shopping complex, or a high-visibility commercial unit, we provide expert guidance to secure the best locations in Bengaluru.
commercial.para2: Our deep market insights and strategic partnerships with top developers enable us to offer high-end commercial spaces in key business districts, ensuring maximum footfall and brand exposure.
commercial.whyTitle: Why Choose Our Commercial & Retail Spaces?
commercial.point1: Prime locations in Bengaluru’s business hubs.
commercial.point2: High footfall areas for maximum visibility.
commercial.point3: Flexible leasing options tailored to business needs.
commercial.point4: Customizable spaces for retail, restaurants, and showrooms.
commercial.point5: Expert negotiation support for the best deals.
commercial.closing: Let Enosh Infra help you establish your presence in Bengaluru’s thriving commercial landscape.

seo.title: Co-Working Spaces - Enosh Infra
seo.description: Discover premium co-working spaces with plug-and-play facilities tailored for startups, freelancers, and enterprises.

coworking.title: Co-Working Spaces
coworking.para1: Enosh Infra provides top-tier co-working spaces designed for startups, freelancers, and enterprises looking for a flexible and dynamic work environment. Our spaces offer state-of-the-art infrastructure, high-speed internet, and a collaborative atmosphere that fosters productivity and innovation.
coworking.point1: Flexible workspaces tailored to your needs.
coworking.point3: Fully furnished with ergonomic seating and modern interiors.
coworking.point5: Access to conference rooms, breakout areas, and cafeteria.
coworking.plugPara: Our plug-and-play co-working spaces come fully equipped with office essentials, enabling you to set up and start working immediately. No hassle, no downtime—just walk in, plug in, and get to work!
coworking.closing: Experience seamless workspaces with Enosh Infra.

seo.title: Trending Warehouse Locations - Enosh Infra
seo.description: Explore the most sought-after warehouse locations in Bengaluru with Enosh Infra.

trending.title: Trending Warehouse Locations
trending.bommasandra: Offers excellent connectivity to Hosur Road and Electronic City, making it a prime hub for industrial and warehousing operations.
trending.nelamangala: Ideal for large-scale logistics with proximity to major highways like NH-75 and NH-48, enhancing distribution efficiency.
trending.peenya: One of Asia's largest industrial hubs, perfect for warehousing with seamless access to major transport networks.
trending.jigani: A key industrial belt with close connectivity to Bannerghatta Road and Electronics City.
trending.hoskote: A strategic industrial and logistics corridor with access to NH-75, making transportation seamless.
trending.kumbalgodu: Strategically located on Mysore Road, ideal for logistics and warehousing operations with excellent highway access.
trending.doddaballapura: Offers ample space for industrial development with proximity to the Bangalore International Airport.
trending.hebbal: Known for its connectivity to the airport and Outer Ring Road, making it suitable for logistics operations.
trending.whitefield: A booming industrial and IT hub with excellent road and rail connectivity.
